events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday evening. My vehicle was severely damaged in the collision, and I would like to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as the incident involved my personal car getting damaged in a traffic collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and processing of your vehicle damage claim following the accident.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and have started the process to review details about the accident and the damages to your car.
Please submit photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with the accident claim investigation.
The requested documents including photos of the damaged car and the official police report have been submitted successfully for review.
The investigation into the car accident claim is now underway, including assessments by the adjuster on the extent of vehicle damage.
The insurance adjuster has completed the inspection and verified the damages to your vehicle as reported in the claim.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on the damage evaluation and your policy terms to cover the repair costs for your car.
You have provided feedback regarding the settlement offer, requesting clarification on some of the charges and covered damages.
Your claim has been approved by our claims department, and we will proceed with the payment as per the proposed settlement.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount has been issued and should reflect in your bank account within 3 to 5 business days.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed after the successful payment and resolution of all related issues.
All files related to your vehicle accident claim have been archived securely in our system for future reference if needed.
